title: Exam Grades
question_text:
A college professor displays the distribution of her final exam scores for her five classes using a variety of graphs.
The graph below shows the distribution of exam scores for Monday's class.
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

Which class has a higher center than Monday's class?

choices.text:
Tuesday's class:

All of these choices have centers that are lower than Monday's class center.

solution:
Since Monday's dotplot is fairly symmetric, the median is an appropriate measure of center. With
35
 exam scores
, the median is the
18
th
exam score from the bottom,
88
.

Explanation of Distractors

Choice 'A' is incorrect because the center of the histogram is around
80
.

Choice 'B' is incorrect because the center of the boxplot is around
81
.
